verses.roman:
sarva-śāstre kṛṣṇa-bhaktye nāhi yāṅra sama
ataeva 'advaita-ācārya' tāṅra nāma

synonyms: sarva-śāstre—in all revealed scriptures; kṛṣṇa-bhaktye—in the devotional service of Lord Kṛṣṇa; nāhi—is not; yāṅra—of whom; sama—equal; ataeva—therefore; advaita—without a competitor; ācārya—ācārya; tāṅra nāma—His name.
translation: "He is unparalleled in His understanding of all the revealed scriptures and the devotional service of Lord Kṛṣṇa. Therefore He is called Advaita Ācārya.
